channel.title: GTA SA:RP gets hacked. [how to stop it]
channel.description: Can someone answer me, how can a GTA server even get hacked. What way do they use to hack it? Can someone help me find the solution and fix it? I've had it, they hack us everyday and we get a rollback. The hackers get online and ban everyone for a stupid reason, like: anti-fag etc, or they make everyone admin. Can someone help?!

item.title: GTA SA:RP gets hacked. [how to stop it]
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Moparisthebest:

There are many ways it is possible. A common way it is done that affects all servers written in native code is with a buffer overflow, also the devs could have simply coded a backdoor into the server. The best place to ask would be where you got the code from.

It is not for me, but for a gta server I play: http://www.gtasarp.com/forums/index.php
It gets hacked almost everyday by a same server because they have an argue with each other.
The reall SA:RP had very much players but 1 admin left the game to make his own server.
Some other admins went with him, well they made the SAME server as the reall SA:RP.
Now they’re hacking the server, on to try to get the players back by banning everyone and promising them stuff.
That’s very annoying because we get rollbacks, that’s why I wanted help to know why and how the server gets hacked, and how to fix it. Because it is very annoying for everyone on the server. Since I am new to Gta servers, I can’t really do anything because I am not experienced enough to.

Read full topic
item.source: GTA SA:RP gets hacked. [how to stop it]
